venue.name: Humustacia Permaculture Gardens (Charles & Julia Yelton's Home)

item.description:
In this one-day workshop, you will learn to construct a two position, 12’ by 24’ movable, unheated, four-seasons greenhouse to provide food security for your entire family year round.

During this one day empowerment workshop we will bend the hoops, drill holes, assemble the tracks, assemble the hoop frame, top rail and purlins, mount the wheels, cover the greenhouse and tie down the covering.

Also covered will be the building of deep compost beds, green manure crops for spring planting, effective composting of food scraps in winter and the making of compost teas for greenhouse growth.

Bring gloves, a bagged lunch and your notebook/camera.
15 places are available and the workshop cost is sliding scale $35.00 – $50.00

This session is being facilitated by Charles & Julia Yelton of Whitefield Maine.
item.how_to_find_us: Please park along road and walk down driveway.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: One-Day Movable Greenhouse Workshop in Whitefield
